tagline: Demonstration web application using Bottle.py Angular.js  twitter bootstrap and html5
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: I recently gave a presentation at the Utah Python Users Group on web applications using bottle.py, angular.js, twitter bootstrap (css), and html5.  This page describes in more detail how it works and also explains a little bit of the technical bits and pieces.
name: Upugdemo
